categories.title: Neural Simulations
categories.description: Comprehensive data on computational brain models and neural simulations across organisms.

datasets.title: Neuron Simulations Database
datasets.description: Compilation of neural simulation projects including neuron/synapse counts, hardware specifications, and simulation parameters across organisms from C. elegans to human.

datasets.title: Computational Models of the Brain
datasets.description: Historical compilation of computational brain models from 1992 to present, tracking evolution from silicon implementations to biophysical models.

datasets.title: Computational Demands by Organism
datasets.description: Computational requirements (FLOPS, memory) for simulating nervous systems of different organisms, from nematodes to humans.

categories.title: Neural Recordings
categories.description: Historical and contemporary data on neural recording techniques, capabilities, and information rates.

datasets.title: Neural Recordings History
datasets.description: Historical neural recording data from 1957 to present, tracking the progression of electrophysiology and imaging techniques.

datasets.title: Neural Dynamics References
datasets.description: Neural recording studies with detailed temporal and spatial resolution metrics across model organisms.

datasets.title: Neural Information Rate
datasets.description: Evolution of neural recording techniques and information yield from 2014-2021, including Neuropixels advances.

datasets.title: Recording Methods Comparison
datasets.description: Comparison of recording techniques by spatial volume and cell resolution capabilities.

categories.title: Connectomics
categories.description: Data on brain connectivity mapping at various resolutions, from synaptic to regional scales.

datasets.title: Connectomics at 2nm Resolution
datasets.description: Highest resolution connectomics data with time and cost estimates for complete brain mapping.

datasets.title: Connectomics at 10nm Resolution
datasets.description: Connectomics feasibility data at 10nm resolution for mouse and human brain mapping.

datasets.title: Connectomics at 25nm Resolution
datasets.description: Mid-range resolution connectomics with more practical timelines for brain reconstruction.

datasets.title: Connectomics at 50nm Resolution
datasets.description: Lower resolution connectomics offering the most feasible timelines for whole-brain mapping.

datasets.title: Large-Scale Brain Imaging Datasets
datasets.description: Compilation of major brain imaging datasets including volume, resolution, acquisition time, and costs.

datasets.title: Neuron Tracing Methods Evolution
datasets.description: Historical evolution from manual tracing (1986) to modern semi-automatic approaches.

categories.title: Costs & Funding
categories.description: Economic analysis of neuroscience projects, hardware costs, and comparisons to other megaprojects.

datasets.title: Neuron Reconstruction Costs
datasets.description: Historical cost data showing dramatic reduction from $16,556/neuron (1986) to $100/neuron (2022).

datasets.title: Neuroscience Megaprojects
datasets.description: Funding data for major neuroscience initiatives and commercial brain-computer interfaces.

datasets.title: Non-Neuroscience Megaprojects (Comparison)
datasets.description: Large-scale project costs (military, communications, medicine) for scale comparison.

datasets.title: Historical Storage Costs
datasets.description: Storage media pricing trends from 1957 to present, showing exponential cost reduction.

datasets.title: Compute Hardware Characteristics
datasets.description: Modern computing hardware benchmarked for neural simulation (MacBook to TPU v5e).

datasets.title: Major Infrastructure Project Costs
datasets.description: Global benchmark costs for large projects (F-35, Apollo, ISS) for comparison.
datasets.filename: Digital Human Intelligence Figures - Costs of different projects.csv

categories.title: Model Organisms
categories.description: Reference data on model organisms used in neuroscience research.

datasets.title: Organism Characteristics
datasets.description: Reference data for model organisms including brain volume, neuron counts, and firing rates.

categories.title: Brain Initiatives
categories.description: Overview of major brain research programs and their goals.

datasets.title: Brain Research Initiatives Overview
datasets.description: Major brain research initiatives including Allen Institute, Human Brain Project, and BRAIN Initiative.
datasets.filename: Overview of Brain Initiatives T4 v2.xlsx - Sheet1.csv

categories.title: Resources & Repositories
categories.description: Links to major neuroscience data repositories and resources.

datasets.title: Neuroscience Data Repositories
datasets.description: Major data repositories including NWB, OpenNeuro, DANDI, and BioImage Archive.

categories.title: AI & Compute
categories.description: Computational requirements for AI training as a reference point.

datasets.title: AI Training Computation
datasets.description: Training computation requirements for various AI models (petaFLOPs) for comparison.
